title: Ego Visibility Flaw in Survival Assets
pattern: Critical survival systems are not only centralized, but also publicized for prestige or symbolic power.
signal: Promotion of single sites or projects as 'the last backup' or 'humanity's safeguard.'
impact: Transforms resilience into vulnerability: assets become symbolic targets, while true resilience (distributed, redundant, humble) is ignored.
example: The Svalbard Global Seed Vault is globally publicized, turning a fragile single-point reserve into both a dependency and a political trophy.
